title: Diamond Dazzle: Contemporary Bridal Haaram
materials: 18K Rose Gold setting. Showcases a collection of brilliant-cut diamonds. Each diamond is VS clarity with a G-H color grade. Hallmarked for gold purity and authenticity. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Features a modern interpretation of the classic Haaram design. The graduating teardrop motif is intricately set with diamonds, creating a captivating cascade effect. The delicate diamond-studded bail adds an extra touch of elegance. The openwork design ensures comfortable wear while maximizing sparkle. Minimalist design, blending seamlessly into modern aesthetics and traditional celebrations.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) against the warm hue of rose gold. The rose gold beautifully complements Indian skin tones.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. Also suitable for cocktail parties and black-tie events
where a touch of modern elegance is desired.
description: This Diamond Haaram offers a modern take on a timeless classic. Its meticulous craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds, and versatile design make it a cherished heirloom. The use of rose gold gives it a contemporary edge while retaining the traditional charm of a Haaram. Its lightweight design ensures all-day comfort. An investment in timeless beauty and enduring value.
